pullrequest.title: Rotate force/torque with mouse on Apply Force/Torque dialog

content.raw:
in general I'll be careful about protecting a visual update with a lock. A visual update should only happen in the main rendering thread and having a lock here means that there could be two more threads wanting to update the visual and this could cause a crash. 

Can `SetCoM` and other functions be called from other threads?
